alert.note: Alert for Bay; Huron; Saginaw; Sanilac; Tuscola (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 6:20PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Tuscola, Sanilac, southeastern Bay, northeastern Saginaw and Huron Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 620 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Caseville to near Sebewaing to near Reese. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Gagetown and Owendale around 625 PM EDT. Port Austin and Pigeon around 630 PM EDT. Akron and Elkton around 635 PM EDT. Caro and Bad Axe around 640 PM EDT. Kinde around 645 PM EDT. Cass City around 650 PM EDT. Harbor Beach, Port Hope and Argyle around 700 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Parisville, Arthur, Colling, Huron City, White Rock, Wisner, Ivanhoe, Rapson, Grindstone City and Ellington. People attending World Expo of Beer should seek safe shelter immediately! MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
